title: The Easiest Way to Make Wood in Little Alchemy 2: Tool + Tree

steps.title: Make lightning.
steps.content: Make lightning. You’ll need the lightning item to make life! If you’re just getting started playing Little Alchemy , check out our guide on how to make stuff . [1] X Research source earth + earth = land land + land = continent continent + continent = planet planet + air = atmosphere atmosphere + water = cloud cloud + cloud = storm storm + land = lightning

steps.title: Make life.
steps.content: Make life. Making life is essential to making the human item. You can also use it to make various items like animals, professions, and even Godzilla . [2] X Research source water + water = puddle puddle + puddle = pond pond + pond = lake lake + lake = sea sea + sea = ocean ocean + lightning = life

steps.title: Make clay.
steps.content: Make clay. This will be used to make human. [3] X Research source water + earth = mud fire + earth = lava lava + air = stone stone + mud = clay

steps.title: Make human.
steps.content: Make human. [4] X Research source clay + life = human

steps.title: Make tool.
steps.content: Make tool. You’ve completed one of two items necessary for making wood. human + stone = tool

steps.title: Make sun.
steps.content: Make sun. This is one component of making a tree, which you'll need to combine with a tool to make wood. cloud + air = sky sky + fire = sun

steps.title: Make philosophy.
steps.content: Make philosophy. This is the second component of the big item. lightning + human = hero hero + human = story story + human = philosophy

steps.title: Make a plant.
steps.content: Make a plant. earth + life = soil soil + life = plant

steps.title: Make tree.
steps.content: Make tree. A tree is just a big plant. This is the second item needed for making wood. [5] X Research source plant + big = tree

steps.title: Combine tool and tree to make wood.
steps.content: Combine tool and tree to make wood. This is the final step! To make wood in Little Alchemy 2, combine the following items: [6] X Research source tool + tree = wood
